lines.text: [Referring to some hippies on the beach]
It seems that living near the water brings out the best and worst in us.
I am known as the Count of Darkness, the Lord of the Manor of Corpathia.
You see! You must open your eyes to see things! There's more to come!
If you've got a fireplace, burn some wood in it. It'll be a lot better than running loose on the streets.
C'mon, let's get ready for the big protest tonight!
I don't know. But I'll bet it's fun!
True. All illusions look real or they wouldn't be illusions, would they?
And all those who would meddle in the destinies of Frankenstein and Dracula... will see an infernal bloodbath the likes of which has not swept the Earth before!
My coffin awaits you becoming immortal in its embrace!
No, him! Him! Him! No! Him! Him!
